email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to provide a freight quote for the shipment of 15,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Busan under CIF terms. Our initial offer is $45 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 220 meters. The laycan is from 2024-04-01 to 2024-04-10. Please let us know if this works for you or if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate of $45 per metric ton is higher than our current budget. Given the volume of the shipment, could you consider revising the rate to $40 per metric ton?

Additionally, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and laytime?

Best regards,
Michael Choi
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of $42 per metric ton. The laytime will be 5 days, and the demurrage rate will be $8,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $42 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we would like to confirm the laytime start and end dates.

Best regards,
Michael Choi
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2024-04-01 and end on 2024-04-05. We will provide the necessary documentation for the shipment once the laytime is confirmed.

Please let us know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We confirm the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Choi
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for 15,000 MT of Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Busan - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers
